english.segment1: sit around as you run around my head. i can't sleep at night. it's getting late so send the children off to bed. i can't sleep at night
english.segment2: i know you. you know me. but it's over now and that's the way it should be. sit around as you run around my head
english.segment3: sit around as you run around my head. i can't sleep at night. i can see that you're really mad at what you said. i can't sleep at night
english.segment4: i know you. you know me. we don't talk anymore and that's the way it should be. sit around as you run around my head
